metadata.synopsis: Dialogue with a Flaming Fist Manip, Ravengard's search officer, after freeing her from her pod in the Colony Tadpoling Centre.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony Tadpoling Centre (ReCon command "oe tc_teleport")- Interact with the mind flayer device that controls the pod.- Select the "Release" option.- killcombat- Talk to the Flaming Fist Manip.

0.speaker: Manip Shuurga
0.text: On the other hand, maybe I'll just live for revenge. Yeah, by Gruumsh! That sounds like a plan.

2.speaker: Manip Shuurga
2.text: Hurr, what a stench. I'm beginning to think I should have stayed in that pod. In there it only smelled like me.

1.speaker: Manip Shuurga
1.text: Is there any news about Duke Ravengard? Did he get out alive? No, I can tell by your expression. I'm going to have to fall on my sword, aren't I?
